Subject: Your Verizon Monthly Bill Notification

Dear [Customer's Name],

Thank you for choosing Verizon as your service provider. Attached is your monthly bill statement for the period of [billing period]. We appreciate your continued business and would like to remind you that your payment is due by [due date].

Summary of your bill:
- Account Number: [Account Number]
- Billing Period: [Billing Period]
- Total Amount Due: $[Total Amount Due]
- Due Date: [Due Date]

To view your detailed bill statement and make a payment online, please click on the following link: [PDF Download Link]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your bill, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team at [Customer Service Number].

Thank you for being a valued Verizon customer.

Sincerely,
Verizon Customer Service Team
